channel.title: Running my server problem with Dsl :/
channel.description: Ok im running my server on dsl with a modem I don't have a router so i guess I dont have to portforward because I have dsl so when unblock 43594 in exceptions then I get ip and I click ip Duc click check and it says update done then i click run server I try to log on my ip and it doesn't work?

item.title: Running my server problem with Dsl :/
item.dc:creator: @Gackt Gackt
item.description:
@Gackt wrote:

Do you mean you’re trying to log into your server on moparscape? If that’s what you’re trying to do you just put localhost in place of the ip. People will still be able to log on to it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@hybrent wrote:

Hey, I have the same problem. I have DSL and I have done portforwarding, opened my firewall, and got a no-ip. I still can’t login using my ip and neither can my friends. Got any tips?

Read full topic

item.source: Running my server problem with Dsl :/

item.title: Running my server problem with Dsl :/
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

have you done this?

Open Network & Internet Connections. Right click on the connection you’re using to connect to the internet and click properties. Open the Advanced tab and click on firewall settings. Open the Exceptions tab and at the bottom you should see a button “Add Port”.
Click on it, and add your server name or whatever you want it to be at the Name field.
At the Port number fill in 43594.
And make sure the TCP box has been checked.

Read full topic
